mapper.sql: ID, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_CODE, DEVICE_NAME, RECIPE_ROW_ID, PARA_CODE, PARA_NAME, PARA_SHOT_NAME, PARA_MEASURE, VALUE_TYPE, REALTIME_VALUE, SET_VALUE, MIN_VALUE, MAX_VALUE, PARA_DESC, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_CNT, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG
mapper.select:
select
from ar_device_realtime_para where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = '0'
select DEVICE_CODE, MAX(UPDATE_CNT) from ar_device_realtime_para where DEL_FLAG = '0' and DEVICE_CODE in (SELECT DEVICE_CODE FROM md_device_info where CLIENT_ID= #{_parameter}) GROUP BY DEVICE_CODE

select
from ar_device_realtime_para where DEL_FLAG='0' and TO_DAYS(create_date)< TO_DAYS(NOW())- CONVERT(#{savedDays},DECIMAL)
mapper.delete: delete from ar_device_realtime_para where id in #{item.id}
mapper.update: update ar_device_realtime_para set DEL_FLAG = '1' where REMARKS = 'RealTimeErro'
update ar_device_realtime_para set DEL_FLAG = '1' where REMARKS = 'StartErro'
mapper.insert: insert into ar_device_realtime_para (ID, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_CODE, DEVICE_NAME, RECIPE_ROW_ID, PARA_CODE, PARA_NAME, PARA_SHOT_NAME, PARA_MEASURE, VALUE_TYPE, REALTIME_VALUE, SET_VALUE, MIN_VALUE, MAX_VALUE, PARA_DESC, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_CNT, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG) values (UUID(), #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipeRowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paraCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paraShotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paraMeasure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realtimeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paraDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'SYSTEM', sysdate(), 'SYSTEM', sysdate(), #{updateCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0')

select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recipeRowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paraCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paraShotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paraMeasure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.valueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.realtimeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.setValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.minValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.maxValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.paraDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'SYSTEM', sysdate(), 'SYSTEM', sysdate(), #{item.updateCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'0' from dual

DEVICE_CODE = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_NAME = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
